title: Sans serif with distinctive jagged ends
author: anigel

comments.content:
This is probably a comic book font. See a similar font, Geek Speak Tweak at: [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/comicraft/geek\_speak\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414102636/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/comicraft/geek_speak_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/comicraft/geek\_speak\_ot/")

Two big comic font sites:  
 [http://comicraft.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414102636/http:/comicraft.com/ "http://comicraft.com/")  
 [http://www.blambot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414102636/http:/www.blambot.com/ "http://www.blambot.com/")
Your suggestion will work. Thank you so very much!
